title: Can't use the support tickets
body: The support page for me just doesn't let me use it, (asks me to login, already am logged in, presses the login button that is there still for some reason, goes no where, log out to try and relogin, won't let me relogin on support).

replies.body:
Are you getting any errors or anything?

The login for the support page and the website (boards) are separate. As you've worked out there's some issues with the transition which require you to log out of boards before logging into support but it sounds like that isn't fixing it for you?

https://i.imgur.com/IrSBuzi.png?noredirect

If your support page has the blank "OC" login in the top right, you're good to go. If it only has your summoner icon with "OCEANIA" it means the support page is seeing you as logged in on the website and not in support.

seems no one is willing to even look into this, 
I have the same issue, my account is locked for no reason, says requires confirmation of credentials via submit a ticket, yet when you click the link, go into submit a ticket via website with correct region and sign in, you just get a blank page.
no login, no money for rito.
should probably get onto this?

Umm..what? This post is 7 months old and the issue has since been fixed. It also doesn't sound like your issue is the same? Given it's age I'm going to lock this thread, but if you're having trouble please make a post in Help and Support with any details you can provide (screenshots will of course help a lot here).
I've tried it both ways and it just gives me a blank page with the css at the top.
